amendment.description: Amendment requires that states receiving State Innovation Completion Grants have plans to increase postsecondary enrollment and completion among dislocated workers.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 10 printed in House Report 111-256 to require that states receiving State Innovation Completion Grants have plans to increase postsecondary enrollment and completion among dislocated workers.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Driehaus amendment (A010) Agreed to by voice vote.
